articles.title: Sensational in the Premier League: Tudor accepts an interim position at Tottenham
articles.summary: (ANSA) - TUDOR, FEBRUARY 13 - Igor Tudor restarts from the Premier League. The former Juventus manager has accepted the role of interim manager of Tottenham until the end of the season.

articles.title: Luka Modric infinite champion: another record broken. And the future...

articles.title: Obvious MOTM and flop: Player ratings for Pisa-Milan from Italian papers
